text: And the Israelites did as Moses had commanded: they asked the Egyptians for articles of silver and gold and for clothing.
From Naphtali: one thousand captains, and with them, armed with shield and lance, thirty-seven thousand men.
priests with the trumpets, and also Zechariah, son of Jonathan, son of Shemaiah, son of Mattaniah, son of Micaiah, son of Zaccur, son of Asaph,
When Jonathan returned, he assembled the elders of the people, and with them he made plans for building strongholds in Judea,

A man called Dositheus, a powerful horseman and one of Bacenor's men, caught hold of Gorgias, grasped his military cloak and dragged him along by brute strength, intending to capture the vile wretch alive, when a Thracian horseman attacked Dositheus and cut off his arm at the shoulder. Then Gorgias fled to Marisa.
A good person brings forth good out of a store of goodness, but an evil person brings forth evil out of a store of evil.
As Jesus was teaching in the temple area he said, “How do the scribes claim that the Messiah is the son of David?
“Gird your loins and light your lamps
Jesus said to them, “The light will be among you only a little while. Walk while you have the light, so that darkness may not overcome you. Whoever walks in the dark does not know where he is going.
